snippet: After the police received a predawn tip about a very special package on a U.P.S. truck, detectives found three five-gallon containers holding 30 pounds of marijuana.
abstract: After the police received a predawn tip about a very special package on a U.P.S. truck, detectives found three five-gallon containers holding 30 pounds of marijuana.

headline.main: In a U.P.S. Truck in Canarsie, Buckets of Green Contraband
